attributes.background:
We ALL need healthcare eventually, so stop the cuts and increase the funding through a dedicated NHS Tax. 

Our NHS should be proud to offer professional services with the best in technological advancements.

Say NO to Healthcare Privatization. 

Say NO to Healthcare Cuts.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178225
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/169749
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/184035
